Citation.sTitle: Solubility and phase behavior of binary systems containing salts based on transitional metals
Citation.sAbstract: Tri(1-ethyl-3-methylimidazolium) gadolinium hexachloride ([emim]3[GdCl6]), tri(1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium)  hexagadolinium chloride ([bmim]3[GdCl6]), di(tetramethylammonium) manganese tetrachloride  ([TMA]2[MnCl4]) and cholinium tetrachloroferrate ([Chol][FeCl4]) were synthetized and their  solubility in water, ethanol, 1-propanol and 1-butanol were determined as a function of temperature.  Activity coefficients were calculated and their comparison with ideal solutions is discussed. The experimental  data were correlated successfully by means of the semi-empirical Grant equation. In addition,  melting point depression effect of high pressure carbon dioxide was studied.
